docs.snippet: Demand for natural gas is expected to grow further in Europe this year, particularly in Britain and Germany, the head of marketing for Norwegian oil and gas firm Statoil said, as countries seek to reduce carbon emissions....
docs.lead_paragraph: Demand for natural gas is expected to grow further in Europe this year, particularly in Britain and Germany, the head of marketing for Norwegian oil and gas firm Statoil said, as countries seek to reduce carbon emissions.

docs.snippet: On the first day of the Australian Open, officials tried to allay fears that the sport has a match-fixing problem, and Serena Williams, the defending women’s champion, showed signs of rust....
docs.lead_paragraph: On the first day of the Australian Open, officials tried to allay fears that the sport has a match-fixing problem, and Serena Williams, the defending women’s champion, showed signs of rust.
docs.abstract: Defending champion Serena Williams struggles in first-round victory over Camila Giorgi at Australian Open, her first official match in four months; world tennis officials hold news conference to deny match-fixing allegations made in joint report by BBC and Buzzfeed.

headline.main: Williams Lures Focus From Match-Fixing Report
headline.print_headline: Williams Lures Focus From Match-Fixing Report

docs.snippet: World tennis was rocked on Monday by allegations that the game's authorities have failed to deal with widespread match-fixing, just as the Australian Open, the first grand slam tournament of the year, kicked off in Melbourne....

docs.snippet: None of the seven Iranians accused or convicted of violating American trade sanctions against Iran were charged with terrorism, President Obama noted....

docs.abstract: Pres Obama insists seven Iranians accused or convicted of violating American trade sanctions and released in prisoner swap deal had no ties to terrorist activity; calls release 'one-time gesture to Iran,' given unique circumstances.

headline.main: Details of 7 Iranians Granted Clemency in Prisoner Swap
headline.print_headline: Of 7 Iranians Released, None Have Ties to Terrorism, Obama Says

docs.snippet: David Levin, 16, has a dream to play pro hockey that has taken him from his home in Israel to Canada and, he hopes, eventually to the N.H.L....
docs.lead_paragraph: David Levin, 16, has a dream to play pro hockey that has taken him from his home in Israel to Canada and, he hopes, eventually to the N.H.L.
docs.abstract: Israeli teenager David Levin is talented hockey player despite having grown up with limited access to ice and getting late start in sport; was top draft pick for Ontario Hockey League's Sudbury Wolves and aspires to eventually play in NHL.

headline.main: Atypical Pursuit of an N.H.L. Dream
headline.print_headline: Israeli Player Hopes Atypical Pursuit Leads to N.H.L.
